prompt: Create a task manager page with a futuristic design. Feature a top app bar with the title 'Future Tasks' in a bold, sci-fi font and a notification icon with a glowing effect. Include a floating action button with a plus icon at the bottom-right, with a subtle glow. Display a scrollable list of task cards, each with a checkbox, a bold task title in white, a description in smaller neon blue text, a priority badge (red=high, yellow=medium, green=low), and a due date with a futuristic clock icon. Include a three-dot menu on the right. Use a dark blue background, glowing card edges, and a neon blue primary color scheme. Include a bottom navigation bar with 'Tasks', 'Projects', and 'Profile' tabs, using neon blue icons. Ensure the layout is responsive, follows Material Design loosely, and emphasizes a futuristic, glowing aesthetic.
